root.title: Root Authority
root.description: Each machine that trusts Koinonia's PKI must have the root certificate.

issuing1.title: Issuing Authority 1
issuing1.description: The authority is currently issuing certificates. You implicitly trust this certificate when adding the root certificate. In most cases, you will not need to add this certificate.

legacy.title: Koinonia-KCFAD01-CA
legacy.description: This is a legacy certificate authority and will no longer issue new certificates. Some services may still require you to trust this authority. In most cases, you will not need to add this certificate.

chain.title: Cerficiate Chain
chain.description: This is a legacy certificate authority and will no longer issue new certificates. Some services may still require you to trust this authority. In most cases, you will not need to add this certificate.
